import { Props } from 'docz';
import { Playground } from '@playground';
import { Form } from 'react-final-form';
import { useState } from 'react';
import { ThirdPartyCard } from './thirdParty';

# Third Party Admin Card

Third Party Admin Card Card for tpr apps

## Usage

```js
import { ThirdPartyCard } from '@tpr/layout';
```

## Basic usage

<Playground>
	{() => {
		const [complete, setComplete] = useState(false);
		const callbackFn = (values, _fullThirdPartyObject) => {
			console.log(values);
			console.log(_fullThirdPartyObject);
			return Promise.resolve(values);
		};
		const thirdParty = {
			id: '',
			schemeRoleId: '123',
			effectiveDate: '1997-04-01T00:00:00',
			organisationName: `McDonald's`,
			address: {
				addressLine1: 'Napier House',
				addressLine2: 'Trafalgar Pl',
				addressLine3: '',
				postTown: 'Brighton',
				county: 'East Sussex',
				postcode: 'BN1 4DW',
				country: '',
			},
		};
		return (
			<ThirdPartyCard
				complete={complete}
				onCorrect={(value) => setComplete(value)}
				onRemove={callbackFn}
				thirdParty={thirdParty}
			/>
		);
	}}
</Playground>

## API

### Props

| Property         | Required | Type                | Description                                                                                  |
| ---------------- | -------- | ------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| complete         | true     | boolean             | changes the state of the card when All details are correct                                   |
| i18n             | false    | ThirdPartyI18nProps | allows to override specific text in the card                                                 |
| onCorrect        | true     | function            | actions for when the user clicks the "Confirm details are correct" checkbox                  |
| onRemove         | true     | function            | actions for when the thirdParty is removed                                                   |
| preValidatedData | false    | boolean             | allows to ignore the state of the "Confirm details are correct" checkbox & shows "No issues" |
| thirdParty       | true     | ThirdPartyProps     | the Third Party object                                                                       |
